channel.title: Where do i do this stuff
channel.description: right,i've never did any programming or anything so can someone please tell me how to start....i mean what do you use to write it(e.g microsoft word(i know its not tht just usin example)

item.title: Where do i do this stuff
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

VB is easy to learn, but harder to make certain stuff
Delphi is avarage, between VB and C++, a bit of a mix
C++ is one of the harder languages, not recommended to start with
Java is also hard like C++
